segments.text: Hello , Anna speaking !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , Anna , this is Jason .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jason , where have you been hiding lately ? You know it's been a long time since your last call . Have you been good ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . How are you , Anna ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am fine . What have you been doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working . I've been really busy these days . I got a promotion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great , congratulations !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I am feeling pretty good about myself too . You know , bigger office , a raise and even an assistant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . So I guess I'll have to make an appointment to see you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are kidding .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long have you been working there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A bit over two years . This is a fast-moving company , and seniority isn â€™ t the only factor in deciding promotions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you like your new boss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is very nice and open-minded .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Much better than the last one , huh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . He was a real slave driver . He probably would have loved it if we were robots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Forget about him . Come over to my house tonight . Let's get drunk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Tonight 8 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 8 it is . See you then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
